titleStmt.title: San Marino, California, Henry E. Huntington Library, MS EL 34 A 8

msItem.title: Chapter list of statutes; calendar (added); Magna carta with statutes

history.provenance: Provenance: Evidence of Staffordshire connections, f. 2v; inscr. ‘Robert Bulkeley’, c. 1500; John Egerton, earl of Bridgewater; acq. Henry Huntington, 1917.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 133; ELMUSA, p. 40 ; Dutschke, I, pp. 53–5.

body.p:
San Marino, California, Henry E. Huntington Library
MS EL 34 A 8. Chapter list of statutes; calendar (added); Magna carta with statutes. ii + 169 + ii ff. 130 x 86 mm..
Provenance: Evidence of Staffordshire connections, f. 2v; inscr. ‘Robert Bulkeley’, c. 1500; John Egerton, earl of Bridgewater; acq. Henry Huntington, 1917.
Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 133; ELMUSA, p. 40 ; Dutschke, I, pp. 53–5.
